page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT AND THE Y.T.S.
page.content: The unemployment rate in our area is about 1/3. This can cause problems because there are few amenities here. The nearest job centres are in Easterhouse and Parkhead. There are more young people working than older, because of the{Youth Training Scheme. 66% of those on the Y.T.S. are given a permanent job at the end of their time. If they do not accept a Y.T.S. place they have little chance of a job. Less than 5% people get jobs through relatives. We could stop unemployment from going up by asking the government for money to fix the roads. The government has little to do with the Y.T.S, they just give them money if they need it. It is the Manpower Services Commission which runs the Y.T.S. { (Janet, 16y )
